process_details.description: The Produce Solicitation business process develops and publishes solicitations for contractor services including Requests for Proposals (RFPs), Requests for Information (RFIs), and sole source justifications. The process ensures solicitations comply with procurement regulations and clearly communicate requirements to potential contractors.
results: Tracking information as needed for measuring performance and business activity monitoring.
process_steps: Receive and respond to questions from potential contractors.
process_details.constraints: Solicitation process must comply with state and federal procurement regulations.
performance_measures: Time to produce solicitation = ___ months; ___ weeks
